ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank P. Gastaminza for critically reading the manuscript. We also thank Silvia Gutierrez-Erlandsson and Noelia Zamarreño for excellent technical support and Anna Ferrer and Heinz Himmelbauer (CRG Genomics Unit) for their help with RNA deep sequencing. We gratefully acknowledge Paloma Rodríguez and Isidoro Martínez for providing biological materials.

This work was supported by Spanish Ministry of Science and Innovation (Ministerio de Ciencia e Innovación) ( http://www.mineco.gob.es/portal/site/mineco/idi) grant BFU2010-17540/BMC and by the Fundación Marcelino Botín ( http://www.fundacionbotin.org). S.L.-B. was supported by a graduate FPU fellowship ( Spanish Ministry of Science and Innovation). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and interpretation, or the decision to submit the work for publication.
